author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: يا أيّها الملك فوالله ما أريد أن أشكو منهم في حضرتك إنّما أشكو بثّي وحزني إلى الله الّذي خلقنا وإيّاهم وكان علينا وعليهم لشاهد ووكيل بل أريد
translation: I swear by God, O King! It is not My wish to make My plaint to thee against them that persecute Me. I only plead My grief and My sorrow to God, Who hath created Me and them, Who well knoweth our state and Who watcheth over all things. My wish is to warn them of the consequences of their actions, if perchance they might desist from treating others as they have treated Me, and be of them that heed My warning.
